thread.title: Drone crash interrupts US Open tennis match
thread.title_full: Drone crash interrupts US Open tennis match - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Drone crash interrupts US Open tennis match
text:
A small black drone hovered over Louis Armstrong stadium during a US Open tennis match in New York Thursday night, before crashing into the stands and forcing play to be briefly interrupted. As the Associated Press reports, the drone crashed toward the end of a second round match between 26th-ranked Flavia Pennetta and Monica Niculescu.
Play was interrupted between points as police examined the black drone, which broke into pieces after landing in an empty part of the stadium at the Billie Jean King National Tennis Center in Flushing, New York. A spokesman for the US Tennis Association tells the AP that no one was injured in the incident, and that the New York Police Department "is conducting an ongoing investigation." He added that no...
